gelatinous cube.intro_alive: A jelly-like cube wants to encompass you!
gelatinous cube.intro_dead: Now the jelly is just a bunch of wet goo.
gelatinous cube.look_dead: Of him remaains only a bunch of slime.
gelatinous cube.talk_dead: A dead cube has nothing to say.

ravenous squirrel.intro_alive: An angry squirrel wants to bite your carotid artery!
ravenous squirrel.intro_dead: You defeated a squirrel! That's something to be proud of.

helicopter.intro_alive: A helicopter flies at you at full throttle.
helicopter.intro_dead: The helicopter, now silent, is revealed to have been a mountain gadfly.
helicopter.talk_dead: Were the buzzes you've heard so far not enough for you?

mushroom hunter.intro_alive: A mushroom hunter walking around with a wicker basket looks at you in a puzzled way, could he have understood that you are on drugs?
mushroom hunter.intro_dead: The mushroom hunter returns to focus on mushrooms.
mushroom hunter.look_alive: Yes, he sure knows you are on drugs.
mushroom hunter.look_dead: Everyone knows that a mushroom hunter should be concerned with finding mushrooms and not disturbing people ON mushrooms.
mushroom hunter.talk_dead: He is too focused on identifying a mushroom.

bug in the code.intro_alive: A mighty bug in the program threatens to stop the game so you don t win.
bug in the code.look_dead: We will be rostoring normality as long as we are sure of what is normal anyway. Thank you.
bug in the code.talk_alive: << You didn't put a bracket right there!!! >>
bug in the code.talk_dead: There are no more bugs around here.

floating eyes.intro_alive: A swarm of floating eyes surrounds you and judges you severely.
floating eyes.intro_dead: And now all eyes are closed.
floating eyes.look_dead: An eye never dies, but it closes and goes to bed.
floating eyes.talk_dead: << We are closed. Try again later. >>

ants infected by a fungus.intro_alive: Ophiocordyceps unilateralis suddenly attacks you riding on a herd of ants of the species Camponotus leonardi.
ants infected by a fungus.talk_alive: << WE ARE LEGION. Resisting is useless. >>

trog.intro_alive: A dog comes out from behind a tree and attacks you! Wait, so it's not just a dog... it's a Trog!
trog.intro_dead: The dog ran away. It can be said that the trog is no more.
trog.look_alive: This Trog looks very pissed off. Is it hungry?
trog.look_dead: There are no more trogs here!

uncanny valley.intro_alive: A robot which is almost, but not quite, entirely unlike humans confronts you!
uncanny valley.look_alive: Something about it reminds you of GLaDOS...
uncanny valley.talk_alive: << Remember before when I was talking about smelly garbage standing around being useless? That was a metaphor. I was actually talking about you. >>
uncanny valley.talk_dead: << That thing you burned up isn't important to me. It's the fluid catalytic cracking unit. It made shoes for orphans. >>

paranoia.intro_alive: You feel a sense of unbereable paraoia.
paranoia.look_alive: You can't see very weel, you feel very dizzy.
paranoia.talk_dead: You hear the wind that moves the leaves and feel refreshed.

gnome armed with an ax.intro_alive: OH MY GOD! It's a gnome armed with an ax!!!
gnome armed with an ax.intro_dead: This terrifying abomination is no longer the terrible threat it was before.
gnome armed with an ax.look_alive: The argentines are hiking in a north american wood when they spot a strange figure in the distance. They approach to find out if it is an animal, continuing to wonder what it is. The girl throws a stone at him, suddenly the figure gets up: it is a gnome armed with an ax who begins to chase the tourists who are fleeing!!!
gnome armed with an ax.look_dead: Are we sure it was really a gnome?

armillaria ostoyae.intro_alive: An immanent manifestation of the transcendent Armillaria ostoyae blocks your path.
armillaria ostoyae.intro_dead: Armillaria ostoyae stares silently at you from the Underground.
armillaria ostoyae.look_dead: Even if you have defeated her, she still scares you.
